mapper.select: SELECT releaseNo, placingOrder.placingOrderNo, shopName, releaseStatus, releaseDate FROM release, placingOrder, shop WHERE placingOrder.placingOrderNo=release.placingOrderNo AND placingOrder.shopNo=shop.shopNo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO releaseProduct(releaseNo, placingOrderNo, productNo, productCnt) VALUES (releaseNo_seq.nextval, #{placingOrder}, #{productNo}, #{productCnt})
